players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the first one to be killed. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any clues we might have."

Charlie: "Let's continue our efforts to build trust and cooperation within our group. I believe that by sharing information openly and working together, we can increase the chances of identifying the mafioso among us and keeping ourselves safe."
